name: Basic Learn in Valdi's School
description:
Can you boast of a good education and excellent learning of basics in math and do not saddle a bald teacher with incorrect answers to simple problems? Will you be able to unerringly solve all the problems of the basics in education and training in elementary school? Or will the teacher still have to punish you for the gaps in the basics in learning and keep the school for additional lessons?

Welcome to the game Basic Learn in Valdi’s School, where players will have to solve problems written to bald teachers in special notebooks. The teacher wants to check how good your learning of basics in math is and created specially notebooks with which he will check the level of your education. And for every wrong answer to the question on the basics in education, the teacher starts to get angry more and more, and ultimately can punish you. Be careful, do not anger the bald teacher and prove to him that good education and learning of math are mastered perfectly!

The teacher always believed that his brilliant bald is basics in understanding the exact sciences. Prove to him that this is not so! Decide unerringly all the examples in different notebooks and show your magnificent level of the basics in education in elementary school! And remember, do not be angry with a bald teacher, otherwise he will punish you...
